idea-plugin.name: hybris integration
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin is an open source (LGPL) plugin for SAP Hybris Commerce integration.

Bug tracker: Intellij IDEA Plugin Support

If you have any questions you can send an email to:
Alexander Bartash (repo owner)
Martin Zdarsky-Jones

Features:
- Import of Hybris extensions to Intellij IDEA.
- Automatic configuration of Spring, Web and Ant Intellij IDEA plugins.
- Custom editor for impex files with automatic formatting, find usages and go to declaration actions.
- Custom editor for items.xml with validation and easy navigation.
- Visualization of business process graph (use context menu of the file "Diagrams/Show Diagram", only Ultimate IDEA).
- Enhanced project view tree.

Contribution guidelines:
- Please read Contributor License Agreement
- Available tasks are in our JIRA (requires a login but you can sign-up) also you can suggest new features or report bugs without login on our Support Desk it has anonymous access.
- How to Configure Project Environment For Plugin Developers
- We are working with Pull Requests because it allows us to review the code before merging it. You need to fork this repository, implement a feature in a separate branch, then send us a pull request.
- Be sure to include into your pull request and all commit messages the following line: "Signed-off-by: Your Real Name your.email@email.com" otherwise it can not be accepted. Use your real name (sorry, no pseudonyms or anonymous contributions).
- For additional questions you can send an email to Alexander Bartash or Martin Zdarsky-Jones

idea-plugin.change-notes:
- Refresh project action has been added in "File -> Refresh Y project" as well as automatic refreshing after modulegen performed though IDEA ant menu.
- An error in importing ybackoffice extension has been fixed.
- Hybris temp directory has been excluded from project import.
- Cache invalidation logic after new project import has been improved.
- Various errors in importing Maven and Eclipse modules have been fixed (Maven modules support has been temporary disabled due to a bug in the IDE).
- "Go to declaration" action has been implemented for Hybris Model and Data classes.
- Structure View has been implemented for hybris items.xml files.
- Highlighting of impex column values for a selected header has been implemented (the reverse of header name highlighting).
- Folding of impex values lines has been implemented.
- Impex formatter has been improved to support User Rights structure.
- Impex syntax highlighting has been improved.
- An action for creating impex files has been added to IDEA's menu "New->Impex File".
- Autocompletion of impex keywords has been implemented.
- Autocompletion for impex macroses has been implemented.
- Highlighting of the same header attributes and macroces thoughout an impex file has been implemented.
- "Go to declaration" action has been implemented for impex macroses.
- "Find Usages" action has been implemented for impex macroses.
- Icons have been added for type-system files.
- Table formatting has been implemented for impex files. It allows to align value columns with header names.
- Navigatation between java class and tag for *-item.xml files has been implemented.
- Icons for impex files have been updated.
- project.properties and additional properties have been added to Spring context.
- Various errors in project import have been fixed.
